mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.parent_id AS "parentId", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.path AS "path", a.title AS "title", a.sort AS "sort", a.icon AS "icon", a.type AS "type", a.status AS "status", a.button_type AS "button", a.level AS "level", a.component AS "component", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", ( SELECT group_concat(sr. NAME) FROM sys_role sr LEFT JOIN sys_permission_role spr ON sr.id = spr.sys_role_id WHERE spr.sys_permission_id = a.id ) AS "roleNames"
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(p.id) AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.parent_id AS "parentId", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.path AS "path", a.title AS "title", a.sort AS "sort", a.icon AS "icon", a.type AS "type", a.status AS "status", a.button_type AS "button", a.level AS "level", a.component AS "component", a.del_flag AS "delFlag" FROM sys_user a LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.sys_user_id =a.id LEFT JOIN sys_permission_role pr ON pr.sys_role_id = ur.sys_role_id LEFT JOIN sys_permission p ON p.id = pr.sys_permission_id WHERE a.id = #{userId} AND p.type = '1' ORDER BY p.sort ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_permission( id, name, parent_id, parent_ids, path, title, sort, type, status, component, button_type, icon, level, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{parentId}, #{parentIds}, #{path}, #{title}, #{sort}, #{type}, #{status}, #{component}, #{buttonType}, #{icon}, #{level}, #{createBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_permission SET id = #{id}, name = #{name}, parent_id = #{parentId}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, path = #{path}, title = #{title}, sort = #{sort}, type = #{type}, status = #{status}, level = #{leve}, component = #{component}, icon = #{icon}, button_type = #{buttonType}, update_by = #{updateBy}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
